title: How to Boil Peanuts Using Roasted Peanuts

steps.title: Boil together for a minimum of 3 hours.
steps.content: Boil together for a minimum of 3 hours. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Check every 45 minutes to ensure that there is enough water.
steps.content: Check every 45 minutes to ensure that there is enough water. The water will start to boil down and need replacing. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Start to let the water boil away in the third hour.
steps.content: Start to let the water boil away in the third hour. Not so much that the peanuts burn, but enough that the seasoning will stick to the shells to add more flavor and spice.
